United States v. L. Bamberger & Co. No. 8037.

Entered at Newark, N. J.

Entry Nos. N-1056; N-952. (Decided August 13, 1951) David N. Edelstein, Assistant Attorney General, for the plaintiff. Strauss & Hedges (Hadley S. King of counsel) for the defendant. Johnson, Judge:

These appeals for reappraisement have been submitted for decision upon a stipulation of counsel for the parties hereto.

On the agreed facts I find the export value, as that value is defined in section 402 (d) of the Tariff Act of 1930, to be the proper basis for the determination of the value of the merchandise here involved, and that such values are as follows:
